silver_hand_clocks.description: Track the Silver Hand faction's escalating response to Beastblooded activity and Companions interference

silver_hand_awareness.name: Silver Hand Awareness
silver_hand_awareness.description: Measures how much attention the Silver Hand has focused on the PC and their allies. Drives escalating hunter tiers and ultimately unlocks Frostmere Vigil.
silver_hand_awareness.completion_effect: Frostmere Vigil HQ becomes accessible and the High Purifier takes personal interest in the PC

tier_thresholds.1: Scout ambush (minor Silver Hand hunters patrol near PC's known locations)
tier_thresholds.2: Named hunter encounter (a named Silver Hand lieutenant targets the PC)
tier_thresholds.3: Fort raid event (Silver Hand attacks a location the PC has recently visited)
tier_thresholds.4: Attempted assassination (Silver Hand sends an elite squad to eliminate the PC)
tier_thresholds.5: Jorrvaskr siege (if Companions questline active: Silver Hand assaults Jorrvaskr directly)
tier_thresholds.6: HQ unlock (Frostmere Vigil location revealed; High Purifier Valdrek issues personal challenge)

advancement_triggers: Beast Blood used publicly in a populated area (+1)
Silver Hand NPC spared and released (+1, they report back)
Silver Hand cell destroyed (+1, survivors report PC involvement)
PC identified by Silver Hand scout (+1)
Jorrvaskr or Companions allies publicly protected (+1)
reduction_triggers: Silver Hand intelligence cache destroyed (-1, delays coordination)
Named Silver Hand lieutenant captured (not killed) and interrogated (-1)
High Purifier Valdrek convinced of ceasefire (-2)

silver_hand_hunter_response.name: Silver Hand Hunter Response Tier
silver_hand_hunter_response.description: Tracks which tier of Silver Hand hunters are currently deployed against the PC. Resets when awareness drops below tier threshold.
silver_hand_hunter_response.completion_effect: All hunter tiers deployed simultaneously â€” Silver Hand is in full wartime mobilization

tier_descriptions.label: Scout
tier_descriptions.description: 2-3 standard Silver Hand hunters. Lightly armed, silver shortswords. Gather information rather than engage.

tier_descriptions.label: Wolf-Hunters
tier_descriptions.description: Named hunter with wolf-bane equipment. Silver weapons, alchemical silver powder. Will engage in combat.

tier_descriptions.label: Purifier Squad
tier_descriptions.description: 4-5 Silver Hand soldiers with a lieutenant. May include a Silver Hand mage with fire specialization.

tier_descriptions.label: High Purifier's Chosen
tier_descriptions.description: Elite squad personally dispatched by Valdrek Ice-Blood or Sister Kaari. Full equipment, silver weapons and armor.

jorrvaskr_siege_clock.name: Jorrvaskr Siege
jorrvaskr_siege_clock.description: If Silver Hand awareness reaches 5 and Companions questline is active, this clock tracks the Silver Hand's preparation for a full assault on Jorrvaskr. Only activates at awareness level 5.
jorrvaskr_siege_clock.completion_effect: Silver Hand storms Jorrvaskr. Companions casualties determined by party intervention.
advancement_triggers: PC takes no action after awareness reaches 5 (+1 per session)
Companions suffer a public defeat or loss (+1)
reduction_triggers: PC warns Jorrvaskr and defenses are prepared (-1)
Silver Hand leadership disrupted before siege completes (-2)
